sentences.sContent: Both plays were published under the pseudonym of Philip Dayre.
sentences.sCn: 两个剧本都是以菲利普·戴尔的笔名发表的。

remMethod.val: pseudo(=false假， 伪) + nym(=name名字) → 假名； 笔名

words.tran: 匿名的；使用笔名的；使用假名的

trans.tranOther: an invented name that a writer, artist etc uses instead of their real name
